translation: The Blessed Lord said, "In this world, there is a twofold path, as I said before, O sinless one: the path of knowledge of the Sankhyas and the path of action of the Yogins."
commentary: 3.3 People in world? in this in this? Dichotomy twofold? loyalty path? Full previously? Procta said? Maya by Me? Sinless O sinless one? by the path of knowledge? of the Sankhyas? by karma yoga by the path of action? Yoginam of the Yogins.Commentary The path of knowledge of the Sankhyas (Jnana Yoga) was described by Lord Krishna in chapter II? verses 11 to 38 the path of action (Karma).
